sources.organisation: Industria, Trantsizio Energetiko eta Jasangarritasun Saila

definicion: Superficie terrestre incluida en áreas protegidas (Red Natura 2000 y Espacios Naturales Protegidos), y porcentaje sobre el total de la superficie terrestre
formula:
$$PSTP^{t} = \frac{STP^{t}}{ST^{t}} \cdot 100$$

non:

$STP^{t} =$ eremu babestuetan sartutako lur-azalera $t$ urtean

$ST^{t} =$ lur-azalera $t$ urtean

Ekosistema motaren araberako bereizketa ekosistemaren azalera osoan egiten da, formula honen arabera:

$$PSTP_{ekosistema}^{t} = \frac{STP_{ekosistema}^{t}}{ST_{ekosistema}^{t}} \cdot 100$$

non:

$STP_{ekosistema}^{t} =$ ekosistema jakin baten azalera, eremu babestuetan dagoena $t$ urtean

$ST_{ekosistema}^{t} =$ ekosistema jakin baten guztizko azalera $t$ urtean
desagregacion: Ekosistema mota: basoak; hezeguneak; larreak; laborantza-lurrak; asentamenduak; beste lur batzuk
justificacion_global:
Este indicador mide la extensión de las áreas terrestres protegidas, que incluyen las designadas 
a nivel nacional y los espacios Natura 2000. Un área designada a nivel nacional es un 
área protegida por la legislación nacional.

Los espacios Natura 2000 se designan para salvaguardar las especies y los hábitats de 
Europa, incluidos en las Directivas de Hábitats y de Aves de la UE.

Fuente: Eurostat
comparabilidad: EAEn eskuragarri dagoen adierazlea Europako adierazlearekin aldera daiteke.

en.definicion: Land area included in protected areas (Natura 2000 Network and Protected Natural Areas), and percentage of the total land area
en.formula:
$$PSTP^{t} = \frac{STP^{t}}{ST^{t}} \cdot 100$$

where:

$STP^{t} =$ land area included in protected areas in year $t$

$ST^{t} =$ total land area in year $t$

The disaggregation by type of ecosystem is carried out on the total surface of the ecosystem, 
according to the following formula: 

$$PSTP_{ecosystem}^{t} = \frac{STP_{ecosystem}^{t}}{ST_{ecosystem}^{t}} \cdot 100$$

where:

$STP_{ecosystem}^{t} =$ surface area of ​​a given ecosystem included in protected areas in year $t$

$ST_{ecosystem}^{t} =$ total surface area of ​​a given ecosystem in year $t$
en.desagregacion: Ecosystem type: forests; wetlands; grasslands; croplands; settlements; other lands
en.justificacion_global:
This indicator measures the extent of terrestrial protected areas, comprising nationally designated 
protected areas and Natura 2000 sites. A nationally designated area is an area protected by national legislation. 

The Natura 2000 sites are designated to safeguard Europe's species and habitats, listed under the EU 
Habitats and Birds Directives. 

Source: Eurostat
en.dato_global: Surface of the terrestrial protected areas (sdg_15_20) Eurostat
en.comparabilidad: The available indicator is comparable with the European indicator.
